content: Should we leave a note about pyDataverse in https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse-client-python and archive it?

Let's at least mention https://github.com/CenterForOpenScience/dataverse-client-python as well, which I believe is still used in the OSF integration.

@Sherry Lake that integration might get some attention soon, right? Or did I dream that? :thinking:

https://github.com/CenterForOpenScience/dataverse-client-python/tree/feature/dv-client-updates was last updated three months ago.

My point is that the codebase is still maintained elsewhere, by the original authors, OSF.
I do lots of dreaming when it comes to OSF.... I think they do too :wink:
